definition: abbr. for the Big Dipper constellation 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1]
to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together
dry measure for grain equal to ten 升[sheng1] or one-tenth of a 石[dan4]/decaliter/peck/cup or dipper shaped object/old variant of 陡[dou3]
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Vindictive little men and women squabble, with a different kind of relationship.
sentences.chinese: 小男女斗嘴斗气，有了一种别样的关系。

sentences.english: You can use Limit Breaks more frequently under Aura.
sentences.chinese: 在斗气状态下可以经常使用极限技。

sentences.english: I absolutely understand your feeling. Because it's inevitable to quarrel with your best friend.
sentences.chinese: 跟好友闹别扭，常比与情人斗气，更来得火大。

sentences.english: Dragon is a pure call of the mainland of the world, no magic without vindictiveness.
sentences.chinese: 龙腾大陆是个纯召唤的世界，无魔法无斗气。

sentences.english: But I recently dropped the grudge.
Yes. Aura's purpose to increase the chance of receiving a Limit Break.
sentences.chinese: 斗气的作用是提升极限技出现的几率。

sentences.english: Two neighbors had been fighting each other for nigh on four decades.
sentences.chinese: 两个邻居夜以继日地斗气，斗了有40年。

sentences.english: The two began to grudge and do not compromise.
sentences.chinese: 两个就开始互不妥协的斗气。

definition: occult force/the power of a God or spirit
stars of the Big Dipper that constitute the tail of the dipper
to use fully/to put to use
to bid farewell/tricks of the trade/pithy mnemonic formula (e.g. Mao Zedong's 16-character mantra 十六字訣|十六字诀 on guerrilla warfare)
